li.label: ate raw food
li.description: I had to eat raw food. Can't we cook it, or at least synthesize some nutrient paste?

li.label: ate nutrient paste
li.description: I had to eat nutrient paste. I know it keeps you alive, but nobody wants to swallow that glop.

li.label: ate replicated meal
li.description: I ate a replicated meal. It wasn't fancy, but it was filling!

li.label: ate simple meal
li.description: I ate a simple meal. It wasn't fancy, but it was filling!

li.label: ate fine meal
li.description: I ate a really tasty fine meal. Yum!

li.label: ate lavish meal
li.description: That lavish meal was amazing. It nourished my body and my soul.
